mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE AS calleeReqGubunCode, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CANCLE_REQ_DATETIME AS cancleReqDatetime, CALLEE_CANCLE_REASON_CODE AS calleeCancleReasonCode, UNUSL AS unusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE AS calleeReqReasonCode, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 AS terminalErrorCode1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 AS terminalErrorCode2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode FROM ATMS_01001160

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE AS calleeReqGubunCode, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CANCLE_REQ_DATETIME AS cancleReqDatetime, CALLEE_CANCLE_REASON_CODE AS calleeCancleReasonCode, UNUSL AS unusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE AS calleeReqReasonCode, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 AS terminalErrorCode1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 AS terminalErrorCode2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode FROM ATMS_01001160 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001160 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_01001160 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO = #{calleeReqSeqNo}, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU = #{calleeReqChasu}, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE = #{calleeReqGubunCode}, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN = #{calleeChasuGubun}, CANCLE_REQ_DATETIME = #{cancleReqDatetime}, CALLEE_CANCLE_REASON_CODE = #{calleeCancleReasonCode}, UNUSL = #{unusl}, CRT_NO = #{crtNo}, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE = #{calleeReqReasonCode}, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 = #{terminalErrorCode1}, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 = #{terminalErrorCode2}, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE = #{totalClassifyCode} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001160 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN, CANCLE_REQ_DATETIME, CALLEE_CANCLE_REASON_CODE, UNUSL, CRT_NO, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqSeqNo}, #{calleeReqChasu}, #{calleeReqGubunCode}, #{calleeChasuGubun}, #{cancleReqDatetime}, #{calleeCancleReasonCode}, #{unusl}, #{crtNo}, #{calleeReqReasonCode}, #{terminalErrorCode1}, #{terminalErrorCode2}, #{totalClassifyCode} )
